mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.user_id, r.community_id, r.user_opinion, r.detail, r.create_time, r.repairs_time, r.location, r.picture, r.service_date, r.repairs_type, r.star_type, r.repairs_id, r.repairs_type, r.apportion_time, r.linger_time, r.`status`, u.hand_img_id AS imgId, u.real_name as userRealName, u.username as userPhone, r.repairs_worker_opinion, u.nick_name as nickName FROM yw_repairs_info r LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id where r.id = #{id}
SELECT count(*) as number,repairs_type from yw_repairs_info where community_id = #{community_id} GROUP by repairs_type ASC
SELECT * from yw_repairs_info where community_id = #{community_id} AND status=1 ORDER by apportion_time ASC

SELECT c.`name` as communityName, c.id as communityId, t.repairs_type, number, nullif(c.households,0) households FROM ( SELECT repairs_type, community_id, COUNT(community_id) AS number, create_time FROM yw_repairs_info WHERE create_time >= #{startTime} and create_time <= #{endTime} GROUP BY community_id, repairs_type ORDER BY community_id ) t RIGHT JOIN yw_community c ON c.id = t.community_id WHERE c.company_id =#{companyId}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT community_id, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') create_time, repairs_time, repairs_type, `status` from yw_repairs_info WHERE community_id = #{communityId}) t where create_time >= #{startTime} and create_time <= #{endTime}

SELECT count(*) AS number, STATUS FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') create_time,status from yw_repairs_info WHERE community_id = #{communityId})t where create_time >= #{startTime} and create_time <= #{endTime,} GROUP by status ASC

SELECT r.id, r.user_id, r.community_id, r.create_time, r.repairs_time, r.location, r.detail, r.repairs_id, r.picture, r.repairs_type, r.service_date, r.`status`,r.linger_time, u.hand_img_id AS imgId, u.real_name as userRealName, u.username as userPhone, u.nick_name as nickName FROM yw_repairs_info r LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id where community_id =#{communityId} and r.`status` <= 1
SELECT count(*) AS number, star_type as status FROM yw_repairs_info where community_id = #{communityId} and star_type !='' GROUP by star_type ASC
